## Tidyverse {.columns-2}

**Core Packages**

- `ggplot2` (graphics)
- `tibble` (data frames and tables)
- `tidyr` (make tidy)
- `readr` (read in formats)
- `purrr` (functional programming)
- `dplyr` (manipulate data)
